articles.content: Gaming phones have usurped a major share in the market of handheld gaming devices. While brands like ASUS have gone as far as making gaming phones like the ROG Phone 5 that offer functionality simila… [+2568 chars]

articles.title: Razer Is Really Making That Concept RGB Face Mask - GameSpot
articles.description: Razer CEO Min-Liang Tan said he expects we'll need to wear masks "for a long time to come," so the company is moving forward with its high-tech solution.
articles.content: Razer has announced it plans to manufacture and ship the concept N95 face mask it showed at CES 2021 in January, giving a dose of cyberpunk style to people who want to keep themselves and others safe… [+2375 chars]
